snippet: The former N.B.A. star was hired as the coach of Osaka Evessa of Japan’s professional basketball league in January.
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. star was hired as the coach of Osaka Evessa of Japan’s professional basketball league in January.

headline.seo: Bill Cartwright, Now Coaching in Japan, Speaks the Language of Winning
headline.main: In Japan, Bill Cartwright Speaks the Language of Winning
headline.print_headline: In Japan, Cartwright Speaks The Language of Winning
